sentence: Comparing units outstanding versus one week ago at the coverage universe of ETFs at ETF Channel, the biggest inflow was seen in the Consumer Staples Select Sector SPDR Fund ( XLP ), which added 8,250,000 units, or a 5.1% increase week over week.
Among the largest underlying components of XLP, in morning trading today Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) is up about 0.9%, and Coca-Cola Company ( KO ) is up by about 0.5%.

And on a percentage change basis, the ETF with the biggest increase in inflows was the WisdomTree Dynamic Currency Hedged International SmallCap Equity Fund ( DDLS ), which added 50,000 units, for a 25.0% increase in outstanding units.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
